metadata.synopsis: A oneliner PAD for when players interact with a closed brinepool, which looks like a shell. It is clearly similar to the one in the starting room, but that one was open due to the impact of the dragon fire.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Interact with closed brinepool in TUT_Avernus_C -15; 17; -422

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Filled with brine - and a whole lot of those parasites.
0.context: NodeContext: Said with a mixture of disgust and curiosity

1.speaker: Player
1.text: One brine pool, countless parasites. Disgusting things.
1.context: NodeContext: Said with a mixture of disgust and curiosity
